overview: In YOGA BODY BURN guru Denise Austin guide you through a dynamic vinyasa of fat-blasting work-outs designed to burn fat, sculpt lean legs, flatten the tummy and rejuvenate the body. Whether combined or worked individually, these yoga workouts will melt away fat and improve your body's overall tone and flexibility in no time. Namaste.
tagline: Energize Your Spirit As you Reshape Your Body!
title: Denise Austin: Yoga Body Burn
